attributes.action: Parliament to repeal the coronavirus act 2020.
attributes.additional_details: Due to the government only taking advice from bodies, who have vested interests in pharmaceutical companies or have blatantly broken their own lockdown regulations, that have been strictly imposed upon the general public.
attributes.background: Give the sovereign people back the right to choose how to live their lives.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Repeal Coronavirus Act and end all Covid-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995
